Questions.Question: What was the name of the viral challenge where people poured ice water over their heads?
Questions.Explanation: The Ice Bucket Challenge involved pouring a bucket of ice water over one's head to raise awareness for ALS.

Questions.Question: Which viral challenge involved dancing to the song 'Harlem Shake'?
Questions.Explanation: The Harlem Shake Challenge went viral in 2013, with people creating their own dance videos to the song.

Questions.Question: What was the name of the viral challenge where people attempted to eat a spoonful of cinnamon?
Questions.Explanation: The Cinnamon Challenge involved trying to swallow a spoonful of cinnamon without drinking water.

Questions.Question: Which viral challenge involved people attempting to do the 'Gangnam Style' dance?
Questions.Explanation: The Gangnam Style Challenge gained popularity in 2012, with people imitating the iconic dance moves from the music video.
